title: Crutch
description: A basic crutch made of metal and rubber.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the crutch emoji is rendered with a smooth, polished wood grain texture, showcasing Apple's signature realistic lighting. Its form is elegantly curved, with softly rounded edges that convey a sense of sturdy support and gentle assistance. This emoji on Apple devices often symbolizes recovery, overcoming challenges, or needing help in a digital conversation.
